page.title: 13A New Chapel
page.content: An exciting event occurred in the village last year when a modern extension to the Methodist Chapel was opened.A great deal of hard work had gone into the raising of the Â£90,000 for the overall building but it has all been worthwhile. The Chapel is used daily as a Family Centre and it is utilised, not only by parents and children from the village but by mothers and children who stay overnight at the Wesley Hostel when visiting the prison. The Centre is also used four mornings a week by the local Playgroup. The number of children attending Sunday School is increasing and the Chapel held its Sunday School Anniversary again this year. A few weeks ago two bus loads of parents and children went to Newquay on the Annual Sunday School outing.
